welcome.subject: Welcome to Bitlog!
welcome.body:
Welcome to Bitlog!

We're thrilled to have you join us. Explore your dashboard, track your logs, and experience the best of Bitlog.

If you have any questions, feel free to reach out. Let's make great things happen together!

verify.subject: Verify Your Email Address
verify.body:
Verify Your Email

Please verify your email address to activate your Bitlog account:

Click here to verify your email

If you didn't sign up for Bitlog, please ignore this email.

thanks.subject: Thank You for Subscribing to Bitlog!
thanks.body:
Thank You!

We appreciate you subscribing to Bitlog. Stay tuned for updates, new features, and exciting announcements!

forgot.subject: Reset Your Bitlog Password
forgot.body:
Reset Password

We received a request to reset your password. Click the link below to reset it:

Reset Password

If you didn't request this, please ignore this email or contact support.

subscribe.subject: Thanks for Subscribing to Bitlog!
subscribe.body:
You're Subscribed!

Thank you for subscribing to Bitlog. We’re excited to have you onboard.

Stay tuned for exclusive updates, tips, and insights to help you get the most out of Bitlog.

Feel free to explore our platform and let us know if there's anything we can assist you with.

contact.subject: Thanks for Contacting Bitlog!
contact.body:
Thank You for Reaching Out!

We’ve received your message and our team will get back to you as soon as possible.

If you have additional details to share, feel free to reply to this email. We’re here to help!

Best regards,
The Bitlog Team
